page.title: 08DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CROFTER
page.content: In Harris there are lots of crofts and crofters.In each of the seasons the crofter has one main job.In spring he goes out to see his flock of sheep and new born lambs.In summer he will go out and shear all his sheep and dip them in a bath.He also has to cut hay for the winter months when his animals may not get enough on his croft.In the autumn he lifts his crops.the main crop is potatoes.He must also make sure his hay is dry because he won't get another chance to get it dryed.In the winter he must make sure his sheep get enough to eat from the ground,If not he will have to take some of the hay he cut in the summer.He must go out twice a day to make sure his sheep get fed properly.In the evening the crofter gets a little chance to relax with his family around the fire as there is always some job to do.
